instruction: Explain the concept of data transformation.
output: Data transformation is the process of converting data from one format to another. This process involves the manipulation of data elements, such as extracting, rearranging and converting the data, in order to make it more suitable for downstream use and analysis. Data transformation is necessary because it helps to standardize data so that it is easier to compare and analyze, as well as making sure that it is comprehensive and of high quality.
